pkgmetadata.longdescription: Digilent Adept is a unique and powerful solution which allows you to communicate with Digilent system boards and a wide assortment of logic devices. Features: Configure XilinxÂ® logic devices. Initialize a scan chain, program FPGAs, CPLDs, and PROMs, organize and keep track of your configuration files. Transfer data to and from the onboard FPGA on your system board. Read from and write to specified registers. Load a stream of data to a register or read a stream of data from a register. Organize and quickly connect to your communications modules. Program Xilinx XCFS Platform Flash devices using .bit or .mcs files. Program Xilinx CoolRunner2 CPLDs using .jed files. Program most Spartan and Virtex series FPGAs with .bit files.
